name: Box
description: OS X voice control app built with electron

scripts.build: electron-packager ./ VoiceBox --overwrite --out=dist --ignore='^/dist$' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.33.0 --asar --icon=assets/icon.icns && cd dist/VoiceBox-darwin-x64 && zip -ryXq9 ../VoiceBox-${npm_package_version}.zip VoiceBox.app
scripts.build-linux: electron-packager ./ VoiceBox --overwrite --out=dist --ignore='^/dist$' --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=0.33.0 --asar  && cd dist/VoiceBox-linux-x64 && zip -ryXq9 ../VoiceBox-${npm_package_version}.zip VoiceBox
